metadata.description: Aisle row structure with research-backed ROI multipliers

row_structure.height_range_description: Above eye level - requires upward gaze

Strong visibility with 18% sales boost; captures upward glance

row_structure.source_citation: Source: Trax Retail 2024, Tastewise 2025, NCBI PMC Research

row_structure.description: 8% sales boost; requires slight downward glance but still accessible

35% sales drop vs eye level; lowest visibility and accessibility

main_entrance.description: 28% more traffic; first touchpoint sets shopping tone

calculation_formula.example: For $2.99 product at Eye Level Prime (1.23x) in Endcap (1.25x traffic, +0.23 ROI) with High traffic (1.20x): ROI = 2.99 * (1.23 * 1.48 * 1.20) - placement_cost
